[Reflexive Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=6164) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 167 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Opportune Riposte

</column>

---

You can riposte almost without a thought. At the start of each of your turns when you regain your actions, you gain an additional reaction that can be used only to perform an [Opportune Riposte](/Actions.aspx?ID=2819).
